query.statement: SELECT V.CUSTCD, V.CUSTCDNM, V.DO_AK_BOND_AMT, V.DO_BOND_AMT, V.AK_BOND_AMT FROM ( SELECT V.TOP_NUM, V.CUSTCD, (SELECT CUSTNM FROM HLDC_ST_CUST WHERE CUSTCD = V.CUSTCD) CUSTCDNM, ROUND(V.DO_BOND_AMT/1) + ROUND(V.AK_BOND_AMT/1) DO_AK_BOND_AMT, -- 채권합계 ROUND(V.DO_BOND_AMT/1) DO_BOND_AMT, -- 도래채권 ROUND(V.AK_BOND_AMT/1) AK_BOND_AMT -- 악성채권 FROM ( SELECT V.CUSTCD, V.DO_BOND_AMT, V.AK_BOND_AMT, V.DO_AK_BOND_AMT, ROWNUM TOP_NUM FROM ( SELECT V.CUSTCD, NVL(SUM(V.DO_BOND_AMT), 0) DO_BOND_AMT, NVL(SUM(V.AK_BOND_AMT), 0) AK_BOND_AMT, NVL(SUM(V.DO_BOND_AMT), 0) + NVL(SUM(V.AK_BOND_AMT), 0) DO_AK_BOND_AMT FROM MAS_DD_BOND V WHERE (V.BOND_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND (NVL(V.DO_BOND_AMT, 0) + NVL(V.AK_BOND_AMT, 0) <> 0) AND (EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM SCO_UPJANG_MST WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG AND UPJANG = #UPJANG#)) --점장 GROUP BY V.CUSTCD HAVING NVL(SUM(V.DO_BOND_AMT), 0) + NVL(SUM(V.AK_BOND_AMT), 0) <> 0 ) V ORDER BY V.DO_AK_BOND_AMT DESC ) V WHERE (V.DO_AK_BOND_AMT <> 0) ) V WHERE ROWNUM <= 2
